content.title: Your body is your buddy
content.description: The BMI (Body Mass Index) indicates the ratio of body weight to height. It is used as an orientation for the target weight of an adult. The BMI is calculated using the formula body weight (in kilograms) divided by height (in meters) squared. It also depends on age and gender.

content.title: Live healthier with our nutrition programs
content.description: Do you want to change your diet sustainably and live healthier? We support you with our exclusive nutrition programs. Choose the offer that suits you best: Individual coaching or a 10-week online course. We pay the course costs for you.

slides.title: We support you with a healthy diet

slides.title: Health bonus
slides.description: Individual commitment to health prevents diseases. That is why we reward everyone who takes health courses. Get credit for your health bonus courses.

slides.title: Online Health Courses
slides.description: Take advantage of our numerous digital health courses and choose the right offer for you. Every year we subsidize two recognized online health courses with up to 150 euros each.

content.title: Free online prevention courses
content.description: In ten 50-minute units, the trainer will carry out selected exercises with you to strengthen your back and abdominal muscles. content.title: How to get reimbursed:
content.description: You pay for the course and attend at least 80 percent of the sessions. At the end of the course you will receive a receipt and a confirmation of participation. Please note your insurance number on it and simply send both to us. We do not require an application for reimbursement.
